Experience.name: Move one space
Experience.usage: Skip rolling the dice, move one space forward. Can be used once every turn. Cannot be exchanged or traded.

Experience.name: Move two space
Experience.usage: Skip rolling the dice, move two space forward. Can be used once every turn. Cannot be exchanged or traded.

Experience.name: Move three space
Experience.usage: Skip rolling the dice, move three space forward. Can be used once every turn. Cannot be exchanged or traded.

Chance.name: Sailing
Chance.usage: Skip rolling the dice, move directly to Sailing space. Must be qualified to enter Sailing path.

Chance.name: Mining
Chance.usage: Skip rolling the dice, move directly to Mining space. Must be qualified to enter Mining path.

Chance.name: Exploring Mars
Chance.usage: Skip rolling the dice, move directly to Exploring Mars space. Must be qualified to enter Exploring Mars path.

Chance.usage: Skip rolling the dice, move one space forward. Can be used once every turn. Cannot be exchanged or traded.

Chance.usage: Skip rolling the dice, move two space forward. Can be used once every turn. Cannot be exchanged or traded.
